com.poesys.accounting.bs.account

Class AccountGroupDelegate

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.poesys.bs.delegate.AbstractDaoDelegate<S>
      • com.poesys.bs.delegate.AbstractDataDelegate<BsAccountGroup,IAccountGroup,com.poesys.db.pk.NaturalPrimaryKey>
        • com.poesys.accounting.bs.account.AbstractAccountGroupDelegate
          • com.poesys.accounting.bs.account.AccountGroupDelegate
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.poesys.bs.delegate.IDataDelegate<BsAccountGroup,IAccountGroup,com.poesys.db.pk.NaturalPrimaryKey>

    public class AccountGroupDelegate
extends AbstractAccountGroupDelegate

    A business delegate that provides an application programming interface for AccountGroup objects and their dependents. This class delegates to an abstract class, AbstractAccountGroupDelegate. You can modify this class to override methods in that class or to add operations to the API.

    A named group of accounts, grouping the accounts for presentation and aggregation in financial statements

    Author:
    Poesys/DB Cartridge
